Class Account

java.lang.Object
com.example.project3.banking.Account
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Account>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Checking, Savings
public abstract class Account extends Object implements Comparable<Account>
The Account class holds the information regarding a bank account The account number, Profile object of the holder, and the balance are held in each account

  • Field Details

    • MONTHS_IN_YEAR

      public static final int MONTHS_IN_YEAR
      Represents the amount of months in one year.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • NO_FEE

      public static final double NO_FEE
      A constant representing the absence of any applicable fees for an account. Used to signify that no fees are applied during certain operations or account types.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • Account

      public Account(Branch branch, AccountType type, Profile holder, double balance)
      Creates an Account object.
      Parameters:
      branch - 3-digit integer representation of a Branch
      type - 2-digit integer representation of the type of Account
      holder - Profile object that represents the full name and date of birth of an Account holder
      balance - amount of money that is in an Account

  • Method Details

    • getHolder

      public Profile getHolder()
      Retrieves the Profile object representing the account holder.
      Returns:
      the Profile object of the account holder

    • getActivities

      public List<Activity> getActivities()
      Retrieves the list of activities associated with this account.
      Returns:
      a List of Activity objects representing the transactions performed on this account

    • statement

      public final String statement()
      Extracts the statement detailing activities of a bank.
      Returns:
      String full statement to describe activities of a bank

    • addActivity

      public void addActivity(Activity activity)
      Adds an activity to the account's record.
      Parameters:
      activity - the Activity object representing the transaction to be added

    • interest

      public abstract double interest()
      Has the monthly interest of an Account.
      Returns:
      amount of interest to be paid for an Account

    • fee

      public abstract double fee()
      Has the value of the fee on an Account if there is one.
      Returns:
      amount required to be paid on an Account

    • interestRate

      public abstract double interestRate()
      Determines the interest rate applicable to this account.
      Returns:
      the interest rate as a double value

    • withdraw

      public boolean withdraw(double amount)
      Deducts money from the account and updates the balance.
      Parameters:
      amount - quantity of money deducted from the account
      Returns:
      true if successfully withdrawn, false otherwise

    • withdraw

      public void withdraw(Date date, Branch branch, double amount)
      Deducts the specified amount from the account balance and records the transaction as an activity in the account's activity log.
      Parameters:
      date - the date when the withdrawal takes place
      branch - the branch where the withdrawal occurs
      amount - the amount to be withdrawn from the account balance

    • deposit

      public void deposit(double amount)
      Adds money to the account and updates the balance.
      Parameters:
      amount - quantity of money added to the account

    • deposit

      public void deposit(Date date, Branch branch, double amount)
      Adds money to the account, updates the balance, and records the transaction as a deposit activity in the account's activity log.
      Parameters:
      date - the date on which the deposit occurs
      branch - the branch where the deposit is made
      amount - the amount of money to be deposited into the account

    • getAccountNumber

      public AccountNumber getAccountNumber()
      Returns the AccountNumber object associated with this Account.
      Returns:
      the AccountNumber object of this Account

    • getBalance

      public double getBalance()
      Returns a double value that represents the balance of an Account.
      Returns:
      balance of an Account

    • getType

      public AccountType getType()
      Returns a 2-digit AccountType object representation of the AccountType. The three types are: Checking(01), Savings(02), and Money_Market(03).
      Returns:
      AccountType of the account

    • getFirstName

      public String getFirstName()
      Returns a string that represents the first name in an Account.
      Returns:
      first name of an Account

    • getLastName

      public String getLastName()
      Returns a string that represents the last name in an Account.
      Returns:
      last name of an Account

    • getDateOfBirth

      public Date getDateOfBirth()
      Returns a date of birth of Account holder.
      Returns:
      Date object representation of date of birth

    • compareByAccountType

      public int compareByAccountType(Account other)
      Compares two accounts by the AccountType parameter.
      Parameters:
      other - Account being compared to
      Returns:
      0 if the AccountType of both accounts are the same, -1 if first AccountType is less than second, 1 if first AccountType is greater than second

    • compareByBranch

      public int compareByBranch(Account other)
      Compares two accounts by the Branch parameter. First checks if the Accounts are the same county before checking the Branch. Comparison is case-insensitive.
      Parameters:
      other - Account being compared to
      Returns:
      0 if the Branch of both accounts are the same, -1 if first Branch is less than second, 1 if first Branch is greater than second

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Account other)
      Compares the name and date of birth of two accounts. First checks the first name, last name, and date of birth and returns if not equal to 'other'.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Account>
      Parameters:
      other - AccountNumber being compared with
      Returns:
      0 if AccountNumber are equal, negative integer if first AccountNumber is less than AccountNumber, positive integer if first AccountNumber is greater than AccountNumber

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Converts Account to a string that can be printed.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a String that contains the Account Number, the Account Holder, and the Account Balance

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Compares two Account objects for equality.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - other Account being checked for equality
      Returns:
      true if they are the same object: Account object is compared using the Account Number false otherwise
